channel.title: Queued
channel.description: Buffer helper for your Mac OS X

item.title: Version 0.6.2
item.description:
Post to Buffer!

This version allows you to post updates directly from Queued.

I know it looks ugly and it's not yet polished. Facebook integration lacks a bit. I will improve it a lot in following versions. That's my first Mac App ever so bare with me ;-)

Fixed bugs

  • Queued icon will correctly disappear after sending an update

item.title: Version 0.6
item.description:
New features

This version allows you to post updates directly from Queued!
I know it looks ugly and it's not yet polished. Facebook integration lacks a bit. I will improve it a lot in following versions. That's my first Mac App ever so bare with me ;-)

item.title: Version 0.5
item.description:
Feedback needed

Do you feel this app should have additonal features? Do you miss anything when working with Buffer? Let me know!.

Bugs

  • Fixed layout glitch on OS X Maverick

item.title: Version 0.4
item.description:
New features

  • You can check for updates from the main panel
  • Send feedback is easier to discover
  • Queued can be launched automatically when you log in

item.title: Version 0.3
item.description:
New features

  • You can see which day the update is scheduled on
  • You can delete a single update
  • You can publish instantly a single update

Fixed bugs

  • Improved profiles synchronization
  • Selection is remembered between reloads

item.title: Version 0.2
item.description:
New features

  • You can refresh manually to see the latest changes
  • You can delete pending updates
  • Icon is by default black which is not upsetting
